price: Kuma zã ka ga kõwace al'umma tanã gurfãne, kõwace al'umma anã kiran ta zuwa ga littãfinta. (A ce musu) "A yau anã sãka muku da abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."
arabic: وَتَرَىٰ كُلَّ أُمَّةٖ جَاثِيَةٗۚ كُلُّ أُمَّةٖ تُدۡعَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ كِتَٰبِهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: watarā kulla ummatin jāthiyatan kullu ummatin tud'ʿā ilā kitābihā al-yawma tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
